String_key2: A `Python` `string` is a sequence of `characters or text`. It handles text data. Whatever we write inside of single or double quotes is a `string` in `python`.
String_key7: In this example, we have taken two different `variables` in which the value is written inside `double (" ") quotes or single (' ') quotes.`
String_key11: ( means `string`, for checking the data type we use `type()`).
